titleStmt.title: Dialogues of the dead, ancient and modern. The second part Dedicated to Lucian in Elysium.
Nouveaux dialogues des morts. Part 2. English.
titleStmt.author: Fontenelle, M. de (Bernard Le Bovier), 1657-1757.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R.B. at the foot of Parnassus Hill,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the second part of: Fontenelle, M. de, Bernard Le Bovier. Nouveaux dialogues des morts.
Caption title on p.1 reads: New dialogues of some ancient dead. The second part.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 1354), and the Worcester College Library (reel 1947).
Wing number D1373 (at reel position 1354:22) cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
